text:
New to Tomcat I've tried to install the product and although I'm having a 
successful install I'm not able to have the initail screen displayed after 
entering the url http://localhost:9001/

I get the following feedback from Tomcat -

HTTP Status 500 - 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

type Exception report

message 

description The server encountered an internal error () that prevented it from 
fulfilling this request.

exception 

org.apache.jasper.JasperException: Unable to compile class for JSP

Does anyone have a clue why this is happening ?????

TIA - Lars
